name: Block Puzzle Offline
description:
A classic block match game, no hesitation to join 5,000,000 players!

HOW TO PLAY:
• Drag blocks to fill up the lines vertically or horizontally.
• Try to remove multiple lines at a time to get a higher score.
• Game over if no room for extra blocks.

FEATURES:
• Free to play
• Suitable for all ages
• Play Offline without WIFI
• No move limit
• Wonderful jewel and special effect

TIPS:
• Utilize boosters to pass hard levels
• Be clear about what the goal is in level mode

Are you ready to challenge? Let us be the master of the block puzzle and sharpen the brain together!

Block Puzzle games 2022 is completely free to play and in game coins can be won for free either. But extra purchase within Block Puzzle such as extra moves or boosters require payment with real money.

Please kindly contact us if have any question.
• Email: blockpuzzle@zhenglangtech.com
• Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/blockpuzzle.blockpuzzle/
